Quote.Author: Norman Wisdom
Quote.QuoteValue: All my boyhood, all I ever wanted was to be loved

Quote.Author: Norman Wisdom
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm still constantly thinking of ideas. I don't feel 90. I think I'm about 12

Quote.Author: Norman Wisdom
Quote.QuoteValue: You see I'm semi-retired now and don't work all the time, only most of it!

Quote.Author: Norman Wisdom
Quote.QuoteValue: I play drums, clarinet, saxophone, trumpet, french horn, piano

Quote.Author: Norman Wisdom
Quote.QuoteValue: I was in the band as a boy and was taught music and learned to compose

Quote.Author: Norman Wisdom
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got one idea I want to do for a film and you know I just enjoy myself doing bits and pieces

Quote.Author: Norman Wisdom
Quote.QuoteValue: At my age, the radiation will probably do me good

Quote.Author: Norman Wisdom
Quote.QuoteValue: I can never tell a joke, I've always found it easier to just fall over

Quote.Author: Norman Wisdom
Quote.QuoteValue: I owe everything to the army

Quote.Author: Normani Kordei
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't allow someone's hate to dictate your life

Quote.Author: Normani Kordei
Quote.QuoteValue: Honestly, you cannot go wrong with being yourself

Quote.Author: Normani Kordei
Quote.QuoteValue: The only person holding you back is you

Quote.Author: Normani Kordei
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing I look forward to is seeing new places and new people

Quote.Author: Normani Kordei
Quote.QuoteValue: If we always stay true to ourselves, people will always see that

Quote.Author: Normani Kordei
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that it's just about balance, keeping myself centered, and being happy and healthy

Quote.Author: Normani Kordei
Quote.QuoteValue: Unfortunately, there is a lot of abuse and negativity online

Quote.Author: Normani Kordei
Quote.QuoteValue: When I dance, I escape the present and become one with my soul

Quote.Author: Normani Kordei
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom is my hero, and I wouldn't be the woman I am today without her

Quote.Author: Normani Kordei
Quote.QuoteValue: It's impossible for five people to have the exact same ambitions all around

Quote.Author: Novak Djokovic
Quote.QuoteValue: Joking around is part of my personality, just who I am

Quote.Author: Novak Djokovic
Quote.QuoteValue: I always tried to win. I was as competitive as I am today

Quote.Author: Novak Djokovic
Quote.QuoteValue: I am fast and very powerful on the court, so this is what matters

Quote.Author: Novak Djokovic
Quote.QuoteValue: I want the same thing I've wanted since I was 7 years old. I want to be No. 1

Quote.Author: Novak Djokovic
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had my ups and downs in my private life

Quote.Author: Novak Djokovic
Quote.QuoteValue: It was very unusual for a boy to play tennis in my country

Quote.Author: Novak Djokovic
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel the pressure

Quote.Author: Novak Djokovic
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being around people who care about me, and I care about them

Quote.Author: Novak Djokovic
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happy, my family's happy, everything is going well

Quote.Author: Novak Djokovic
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying not to pay too much attention to the rankings because calculations can distract you

Quote.Author: Nuno Bettencourt
Quote.QuoteValue: I am affected by what is around. I don't think many people would admit that

Quote.Author: Nuno Bettencourt
Quote.QuoteValue: Who needs fan mail when you have the Internet?

Quote.Author: Nuno Bettencourt
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are in this business and this career, it's hard for any one thing to engulf you

Quote.Author: Nuno Bettencourt
Quote.QuoteValue: My current project is my band, Population 1. We are writing, rehearsing and playing in Los Angeles

Quote.Author: Nuno Bettencourt
Quote.QuoteValue: Live are a really good band. I like Stone Temple Pilots, Radiohead I love. Even Oasis

Quote.Author: Nuno Bettencourt
Quote.QuoteValue: It's just a bunch of songs. I'm not trying to cure any major disease

Quote.Author: Nuno Bettencourt
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm a music fan before anything else

Quote.Author: Nuno Bettencourt
Quote.QuoteValue: I never record anything like a demo, I just go for it

Quote.Author: Nuno Bettencourt
Quote.QuoteValue: Half the bands I guarantee wouldn't at this point want Nuno to open for them

Quote.Author: Nuno Bettencourt
Quote.QuoteValue: As much as you put into it is as much as you get out of it

Quote.Author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: When people start dancing, they dance like they don't know they are doing it

Quote.Author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have tried to make the music a bit easier for them to understand

Quote.Author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a Sufi, but I follow the Sufi

Quote.Author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, you've got to sing from the depths of the heart

Quote.Author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: On the fortieth day after his death, we held the ceremony, and I performed for the very first time

Quote.Author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: In his day, the audience was well aware of the music, of the classical beat

Quote.Author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: These three elements are called Qawwali, and they've got to be there

Quote.Author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a daughter, she's twenty years old

Quote.Author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I also like Western classical music and jazz

Quote.Author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I do listen to other music though, and try to pick up what is good

Quote.Author: Nyle DiMarco
Quote.QuoteValue: American Sign Language requires a lot of facial and body expression

Quote.Author: Nyle DiMarco
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the biggest misconception is that people think deaf people are not able to do things

Quote.Author: Nyle DiMarco
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born deaf. Sound never existed in my life, and this is completely normal to me

Quote.Author: Nyle DiMarco
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always aspired to be the type of role model who can bridge the deaf and hearing communities

Quote.Author: Nyle DiMarco
Quote.QuoteValue: There are so many deaf kids out there being deprived of their own language

Quote.Author: Nyle DiMarco
Quote.QuoteValue: I got my mathematics degree because I wanted to teach deaf children math

Quote.Author: Nyle DiMarco
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm fortunate to have blue eyes!

Quote.Author: Nyle DiMarco
Quote.QuoteValue: Own your identity. Love who you are in the world. Love your deafness

Quote.Author: Nyle DiMarco
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm ready to take the world by storm and have them look at me and say, 'Deaf people can dance.'

Quote.Author: Nyle DiMarco
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we really do need deaf people out there writing their own shows

Quote.Author: O. Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: The true adventurer goes forth aimless and uncalculating to meet and greet unknown fate

Quote.Author: O. Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: Turn up the lights. I don't want to go home in the dark

Quote.Author: O. Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: We may achieve climate, but weather is thrust upon us

Quote.Author: O. Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: There is one day that is ours. Thanksgiving Day is the one day that is purely American

Quote.Author: O. Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: A straw vote only shows which way the hot air blows

Quote.Author: O. Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: By rights you're a king. If I was you, I'd call for a new deal

Quote.Author: O. Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: If men knew how women pass the time when they are alone, they'd never marry

Quote.Author: O. Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: When one loves one's Art no service seems too hard

Quote.Author: O. Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is made up of sobs, sniffles, and smiles, with sniffles predominating

Quote.Author: O. Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: Write what you like; there is no other rule

Quote.Author: O. J. Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm absolutely, l00 percent, not guilty

Quote.Author: O. J. Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I've been a great citizen

Quote.Author: O. J. Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: Money takes wings. The only thing that endures is character

Quote.Author: O. J. Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't beat her. I just pushed her out of bed

Quote.Author: O. J. Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm enjoying the money, the big house, the cars; what ghetto kid wouldn't?

Quote.Author: O. J. Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh my God, Nicole is killed? Oh my God, she is dead?

Quote.Author: O. J. Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know how often I can discuss one incident in my entire life, but I'll continue to do that

Quote.Author: O. J. Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: If there wasn't no fight, there wasn't no weekend

Quote.Author: O. J. Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: What do you mean you have my children at the police station? Why are my kids at the police station?

Quote.Author: O. J. Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always wanted to be liked and respected

Quote.Author: Obie Trice
Quote.QuoteValue: I just do what I'm here for and that's to make that music

Quote.Author: Obie Trice
Quote.QuoteValue: But since I am in the music industry, I don't want anyone to download music, not on September 9th

Quote.Author: Obie Trice
Quote.QuoteValue: Downloading songs is not good

Quote.Author: Obie Trice
Quote.QuoteValue: Beef is beef, you know. Beef comes, so Beef is real

Quote.Author: Obie Trice
Quote.QuoteValue: Working with 50 Cent was great, you know what Im saying? It was just great to work with 50 Cent

Quote.Author: Obie Trice
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the 1st black platinum artist in Detroit, solo artist in Detroit

Quote.Author: Obie Trice
Quote.QuoteValue: I get the music, I get the beats. And I go to the studios and write the lyrics

Quote.Author: Obie Trice
Quote.QuoteValue: Detroit is right now a new Mecca for Hip Hop

Quote.Author: Obie Trice
Quote.QuoteValue: 7 Mile is like an Ave. Back in the days it was poppin' in the summer time

Quote.Author: Obie Trice
Quote.QuoteValue: I just don't want to be rapping forever. I love it, but sometimes you got goals for yourself

Quote.Author: Octavia E. Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself

Quote.Author: Octavia E. Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Delusional pain hurts just as much as pain from actual trauma. So what if it's all in your head?

Quote.Author: Octavia E. Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Science fiction frees you to go anyplace and examine anything

Quote.Author: Octavia E. Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Science fiction is not formulaic

Quote.Author: Octavia E. Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to give up writing like some people would give up smoking

Quote.Author: Octavia E. Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people really need to think what it's like to have all of society arrayed against you

Quote.Author: Octavia E. Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very happy alone

Quote.Author: Octavia E. Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of us, if we're not careful, tend to dehumanize the enemy

Quote.Author: Octavia E. Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: The big talent is persistence

Quote.Author: Octavia E. Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: How dull it is to have people defining you

Quote.Author: Octavia Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to bring about change is to be proactive and active

Quote.Author: Octavia Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: We all have hourglass figures; your sand just settles in different places

Quote.Author: Octavia Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: To be silent is to be passive

Quote.Author: Octavia Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to create your own path and I'm up to the challenge

Quote.Author: Octavia Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: I am an advocate of education. It is the panacea for all that ails us in our society

Quote.Author: Octavia Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: Tough love is the hardest to give

Quote.Author: Octavia Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: No person is just one particular emotion

Quote.Author: Octavia Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: The hardest thing about writing, for me, is facing the blank page

Quote.Author: Octavia Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is too short, and I need to eat. I am my meanest when I haven't had a meal

Quote.Author: Octavia Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be proactive in bringing about change and enlightening people

Quote.Author: Octavio Paz
Quote.QuoteValue: Deserve your dream

Quote.Author: Octavio Paz
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is an attempt at penetrating another being, but it can only succeed if the surrender is mutual

Quote.Author: Octavio Paz
Quote.QuoteValue: Perhaps things are not things but words: metaphors, words for other things

Quote.Author: Octavio Paz
Quote.QuoteValue: Wisdom lies neither in fixity nor in change, but in the dialectic between the two

Quote.Author: Octavio Paz
Quote.QuoteValue: Social criticism begins with grammar and the re-establishing of meanings

Quote.Author: Octavio Paz
Quote.QuoteValue: We are condemned to kill time, thus we die bit by bit

Quote.Author: Octavio Paz
Quote.QuoteValue: To read a poem is to hear it with our eyes; to hear it is to see it with our ears

Quote.Author: Octavio Paz
Quote.QuoteValue: What distinguishes modern art from the art of other ages is criticism

Quote.Author: Octavio Paz
Quote.QuoteValue: Writers, you know, are the beggars of Western society

Quote.Author: Octavio Paz
Quote.QuoteValue: The world stretches before me, the vast world of the big, the little, and the medium

Quote.Author: Odell Beckham, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I've personally never had the chance to go to Lambeau Field

Quote.Author: Odell Beckham, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm competitive. I don't like to lose

Quote.Author: Odell Beckham, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I get these weird divine feelings. They're, like, so strong I can't shake them

Quote.Author: Odell Beckham, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Football is my sanctuary. It's where I go to escape. It's where I'm most happy

Quote.Author: Odell Beckham, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to do big things. It doesn't matter whether it's on the field or off the field

Quote.Author: Odell Beckham, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Basketball players aren't always the best dressers

Quote.Author: Odell Beckham, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I never want any problems with anybody in this world

Quote.Author: Odell Beckham, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I pretty much look like an identical twin of my mom

Quote.Author: Odell Beckham, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate losing. Whether it's marbles, spades, blackjack, whatever it is

Quote.Author: Odell Beckham, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Sure enough, my life has been filled with some pretty interesting things every single day

Quote.Author: Og Mandino
Quote.QuoteValue: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later

Quote.Author: Og Mandino
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough

Quote.Author: Og Mandino
Quote.QuoteValue: Always render more and better service than is expected of you, no matter what your task may be

Quote.Author: Og Mandino
Quote.QuoteValue: Always seek out the seed of triumph in every adversity

Quote.Author: Og Mandino
Quote.QuoteValue: There is an immeasurable distance between late and too late

Quote.Author: Og Mandino
Quote.QuoteValue: Treasure the love you receive above all. It will survive long after your good health has vanished

Quote.Author: Og Mandino
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never heard anything about the resolutions of the apostles, but a good deal about their acts

Quote.Author: Og Mandino
Quote.QuoteValue: Tomorrow is only found in the calendar of fools

Quote.Author: Og Mandino
Quote.QuoteValue: You never know what events are going to transpire to get you home

Quote.Author: Og Mandino
Quote.QuoteValue: Do all things with love

Quote.Author: Ogden Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: Parents were invented to make children happy by giving them something to ignore

Quote.Author: Ogden Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: Progress might have been alright once, but it has gone on too long

Quote.Author: Ogden Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: A door is what a dog is perpetually on the wrong side of

Quote.Author: Ogden Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is not having been told that the man has just waxed the floor

Quote.Author: Ogden Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is having a scratch for every itch

Quote.Author: Ogden Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't want to work you have to work to earn enough money so that you won't have to work

Quote.Author: Ogden Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: No, you never get any fun out of the things you haven't done

Quote.Author: Ogden Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: Candy is dandy but liquor is quicker

Quote.Author: Ogden Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: Too clever is dumb

Quote.Author: Ogden Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with a kitten is that eventually it becomes a cat

Quote.Author: Oksana Baiul
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I could compete again, but my good feeling is, these competitions are better as exhibitions

Quote.Author: Oksana Baiul
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I'm not coaching. It's a huge responsibility to coach somebody

Quote.Author: Oksana Baiul
Quote.QuoteValue: Actually I dance really well on the floor

Quote.Author: Oksana Baiul
Quote.QuoteValue: And still I'm not completely happy with my skating. I always feel I can do more and climb higher

Quote.Author: Oksana Baiul
Quote.QuoteValue: I come to Fashion Week events in New York City twice a year

Quote.Author: Oksana Baiul
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care what the critics say or think because I care for and love my fans

Quote.Author: Oksana Baiul
Quote.QuoteValue: I skate now for fun and to keep myself in shape

Quote.Author: Oksana Baiul
Quote.QuoteValue: I started taking ballet lessons when I was three and a half and I still take dance classes

Quote.Author: Oksana Baiul
Quote.QuoteValue: I use Graf Edmonton for boots and John Wilson blades

Quote.Author: Oksana Baiul
Quote.QuoteValue: I want kids to enjoy skating and I think it's a great workout

Quote.Author: Oleg Cassini
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion anticipates

Quote.Author: Oleg Cassini
Quote.QuoteValue: The first lady must be a leader. She must not be a follower

Quote.Author: Oleg Cassini
Quote.QuoteValue: My goal in life was to pursue the good life

Quote.Author: Oleg Cassini
Quote.QuoteValue: My philosophy is this: Do not tamper with the anatomy of a woman's body; do not camouflage it

Quote.Author: Oleg Cassini
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman who laughs is a woman conquered

Quote.Author: Oleg Cassini
Quote.QuoteValue: Today's designers don't care if fashion has no relationship to human anatomy

Quote.Author: Oleg Cassini
Quote.QuoteValue: Clothes are designed for the media, because it's a great show

Quote.Author: Oleg Cassini
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a great believer in luck

Quote.Author: Oleg Cassini
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the first American designer who went all over the world

Quote.Author: Oleg Cassini
Quote.QuoteValue: I was brought up in Florence, a beautiful medieval town whose rhythm is completely in antiquity

Quote.Author: Olga Kurylenko
Quote.QuoteValue: I love boats. I can be on a boat for days

Quote.Author: Olga Kurylenko
Quote.QuoteValue: I love badminton. That's my sport!

Quote.Author: Olga Kurylenko
Quote.QuoteValue: We were born and we die. In between, I think we try to live as best we can

Quote.Author: Olga Kurylenko
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate jealousy, I hate possessiveness. I'm nobody's possession

Quote.Author: Olga Kurylenko
Quote.QuoteValue: Music evokes so many feelings in us, memories, nostalgia, things that are connected to our past

Quote.Author: Olga Kurylenko
Quote.QuoteValue: When you love someone, you should see beyond their image

Quote.Author: Olga Kurylenko
Quote.QuoteValue: When you live in a small town in the Ukraine, you definitely want to go to Paris

Quote.Author: Olga Kurylenko
Quote.QuoteValue: I like men who paint or write or do something creative

Quote.Author: Olga Kurylenko
Quote.QuoteValue: Being single is only sad if you have a problem with your own company. I'm content with mine

Quote.Author: Olga Kurylenko
Quote.QuoteValue: In Paris, everybody is in black! But you know, in Ukraine everyone wears bright colours

Quote.Author: Oliver Cromwell
Quote.QuoteValue: He who stops being better stops being good

Quote.Author: Oliver Cromwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature can do more than physicians

Quote.Author: Oliver Cromwell
Quote.QuoteValue: A few honest men are better than numbers

Quote.Author: Oliver Cromwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Subtlety may deceive you; integrity never will

Quote.Author: Oliver Cromwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Necessity has no law

Quote.Author: Oliver Cromwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I beseech you, in the bowels of Christ, think it possible you may be mistaken

Quote.Author: Oliver Cromwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your faith in God, but keep your powder dry

Quote.Author: Oliver Cromwell
Quote.QuoteValue: We are Englishmen; that is one good fact

Quote.Author: Oliver Cromwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Put your trust in God; but be sure to keep your powder dry

Quote.Author: Oliver Cromwell
Quote.QuoteValue: No one rises so high as he who knows not whither he is going

Quote.Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations

Quote.Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote.QuoteValue: I love everything that's old, - old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine

Quote.Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote.QuoteValue: The company of fools may first make us smile, but in the end we always feel melancholy

Quote.Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote.QuoteValue: I chose my wife, as she did her wedding gown, for qualities that would wear well

Quote.Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote.QuoteValue: Success consists of getting up just one more time than you fall

Quote.Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope is such a bait, it covers any hook

Quote.Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote.QuoteValue: Honour sinks where commerce long prevails

Quote.Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote.QuoteValue: The jests of the rich are ever successful

Quote.Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote.QuoteValue: Every absurdity has a champion to defend it

Quote.Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote.QuoteValue: You can preach a better sermon with your life than with your lips

Quote.Author: Oliver Herford
Quote.QuoteValue: Many are called but few get up

Quote.Author: Oliver Herford
Quote.QuoteValue: When I go abroad I always sail from Boston because it is such a pleasant place to get away from

Quote.Author: Oliver Herford
Quote.QuoteValue: Modesty: the gentle art of enhancing your charm by pretending not to be aware of it

Quote.Author: Oliver Herford
Quote.QuoteValue: Only the young die good

Quote.Author: Oliver Herford
Quote.QuoteValue: There is always room at the top - after the investigation

Quote.Author: Oliver Herford
Quote.QuoteValue: Tact: to lie about others as you would have them lie about you

Quote.Author: Oliver Herford
Quote.QuoteValue: What is my loftiest ambition? I've always wanted to throw an egg at an electric fan

Quote.Author: Oliver Herford
Quote.QuoteValue: A rolling stone gathers no moss, but it gains a certain polish

Quote.Author: Oliver Herford
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman's mind is cleaner than a man's: She changes it more often

Quote.Author: Oliver Herford
Quote.QuoteValue: A man is known by the silence he keeps

Quote.Author: Oliver North
Quote.QuoteValue: I never considered myself a fall guy. I know what I did. I know why I did it. I'm not ashamed of it

Quote.Author: Oliver North
Quote.QuoteValue: I was authorized to do everything that I did

Quote.Author: Oliver North
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trusting in the Lord and a good lawyer

Quote.Author: Oliver North
Quote.QuoteValue: I came here to tell you the truth, the good, the bad and the ugly

Quote.Author: Oliver North
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought using the Ayatollah's money to support the Nicaraguan resistance was a neat idea

Quote.Author: Oliver North
Quote.QuoteValue: God knows, we don't want prayer

Quote.Author: Oliver North
Quote.QuoteValue: And of course there is so much of World War II that is documented that we never have seen

Quote.Author: Oliver North
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm still in touch with a lot people who continue to serve our country well

Quote.Author: Oliver North
Quote.QuoteValue: Bill Clinton is not my commander-in-chief

Quote.Author: Oliver North
Quote.QuoteValue: Writers are storytellers. So are readers

Quote.Author: Oliver Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a villain, I've never hurt anyone. I'm just a tawdry character who explodes now and again

Quote.Author: Oliver Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to give my inhibitions a bath now and then

Quote.Author: Oliver Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe my woman shouldn't work outside the home

Quote.Author: Oliver Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like doing most things unless I can do them quite well

Quote.Author: Oliver Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I do think a carpenter needs a good hammer to bang in the nail

Quote.Author: Oliver Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I also use women as a sex object; maybe I'm kinky. However, I like to talk to them as well

Quote.Author: Oliver Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not as thrilled with myself as I used to be

Quote.Author: Oliver Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: Even though people say Richard Harris and I have been having a great feud, it's not true

Quote.Author: Oliver Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the effect drink has on me

Quote.Author: Oliver Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not live in the world of sobriety

Quote.Author: Oliver Sim
Quote.QuoteValue: The darkness of clubs makes me feel much more secure, and you can hide behind smoke and lights

Quote.Author: Oliver Sim
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Coexist' was tough to make

Quote.Author: Oliver Sim
Quote.QuoteValue: In our school, there were lots of bands putting up posters saying 'Come to our gigs'

Quote.Author: Oliver Sim
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't find touring very creative. There's not much time to yourself with your instruments

Quote.Author: Oliver Sim
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't even imagine how it must be to be a solo artist playing with session musicians

Quote.Author: Oliver Sim
Quote.QuoteValue: The xx do not condone guns!

Quote.Author: Oliver Sim
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never felt any huge intrusions into my personal life

Quote.Author: Oliver Sim
Quote.QuoteValue: I was just making music in my bedroom. I never wanted to be onstage

Quote.Author: Oliver Sim
Quote.QuoteValue: Romy and I, we're learning how to share the xx with people who aren't in the xx

Quote.Author: Oliver Sim
Quote.QuoteValue: As cliched as it sounds, I'm taking every day as it comes

Quote.Author: Oliver Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: There's an electrical thing about movies

Quote.Author: Oliver Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm terrible at horror movies, by the way. I get scared so easily

Quote.Author: Oliver Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I study history in order to give an interpretation

Quote.Author: Oliver Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: When you look at a movie, you look at a director's thought process

Quote.Author: Oliver Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I do believe that movies are subject to a million interpretations

Quote.Author: Oliver Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I never put out a history, I put out a dramatic history

Quote.Author: Oliver Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that many people in history who had power were bumped off because they had power

Quote.Author: Oliver Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: In any film there's always a historical implication

Quote.Author: Oliver Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Lunch is for wimps

Quote.Author: Oliver Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to do historical pictures more, but I don't know if I can

Quote.Author: Oliver Tambo
Quote.QuoteValue: The true facts are not always obvious. They often have to be looked for
